## ğŸ“‹ Code of Conduct Report

This form is for reporting violations of our [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). All reports will be handled with confidentiality and investigated promptly.

## ğŸ”’ Confidentiality

This report will be handled confidentially. We will not share your personal information without your explicit consent, except as required by law or to protect the safety of community members.

## ğŸ“ Report Details

### What happened?
Please describe the incident in detail, including:
- What was said or done
- When and where it occurred
- Who was involved (if you feel comfortable providing names)

### How did this affect you or others?
Describe the impact of this behavior on you or other community members.

### What would you like to see happen?
What outcome would you like to see from this report?

## ğŸ“§ Contact Information

**Email**: conduct@opsaai.com

**Alternative Contact**: You can also reach out to any project maintainer directly.

## â° Response Time

We aim to respond to all reports within 24-48 hours. For urgent matters, please email us directly at conduct@opsaai.com.

## ğŸ›¡ï¸ Our Commitment

We are committed to:
- Investigating all reports promptly and fairly
- Protecting the privacy of all parties involved
- Taking appropriate action to maintain a safe community
- Following up with all parties after resolution
